description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' used for unit testing, which mockingly implements the interfaces 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink'. It includes mock method declarations for various functions related to service control and information retrieval, using Google Mock framework.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework plugin shell interfaces for testing purposes, with methods mocked using Google Mock.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Retrieves the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a certain feature or capability (indicated by a uint8_t) is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specific parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a request ID and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with a type and message.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks service unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Gets the current reason for a state change.

methods.name: ConfigLine (with string parameter)
methods.description: Sets or gets configuration line given a string.

methods.name: StartMode (with parameter)
methods.description: Sets or retrieves start mode via WPEFramework::Core::hresult.
